Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: rename platform/ to mortal_platform/ to avoid Python stdlib conflict

The directory name "platform" shadows Python''s built-in platform module,
causing uuid → platform.system\(\) → ImportError chain that breaks
pydantic/FastAPI imports inside Docker containers.

Renamed to mortal_platform/ and updated all internal imports.
Also reverted unnecessary pydantic force-reinstall in Dockerfile.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
